chapter.title: Simplified Calendar Ontology (SCAL): Simple and efficient ontology to represent calendar information (events, ToDos, recurrency rules...)

refsect2.title: scal:AttendeeRole
refsect2.para: Predefined set of instances: chain, req-participant...

refsect2.title: scal:CalendarAlarm
refsect2.para: An alam according to the ical definition

refsect2.title: scal:Event
refsect2.para: An Event according the ical definition

refsect2.title: scal:Journal
refsect2.para: A Journal entry according to the ical definition

refsect2.title: scal:RecurrenceRule
refsect2.para: Representation of repeating patterns

refsect2.title: scal:CalendarItem
refsect2.para: Superclass of the calendar entities

listitem.simpara: scal:exceptionRDate, scal:rdate, scal:rrule, scal:attachment, scal:priority, scal:isAllDay, scal:end, scal:start, scal:access, scal:calendarItemAlarm, scal:contact, scal:attendee, scal:transparency, scal:resources, scal:textLocation, scal:belongsToCalendar,

refsect2.title: scal:TransparencyValues
refsect2.para: Predefined instances of time transparency for the calendar items

refsect2.title: scal:Todo
refsect2.para: A ToDo according the ical definition

refsect2.title: scal:RSVPValues
refsect2.para: Predefined set of instances: Yes/No (not boolean to allow undefined values)

refsect2.title: scal:TodoStatus
refsect2.para: Predefined instances of status for todos

refsect2.title: scal:TimePoint
refsect2.para: Point in time

refsect2.title: scal:AttendanceStatus
refsect2.para: Predefined set of instances: needs-action, accepted...

listitem.simpara: scal:attendance-in-process, scal:attendance-completed, scal:attendance-delegated, scal:attendance-tentative, scal:attendance-declined, scal:attendance-accepted, scal:attendance-needs-action,

refsect2.title: scal:AccessLevel
refsect2.para: Access classification for a calendar item: public, private or confidential. Use the predefined instances in the ontology

refsect2.title: scal:Attendee
refsect2.para: Contact related with a calendar item

listitem.simpara: scal:sent-by, scal:delegated-from, scal:delegated-to, scal:member, scal:calendarUserType, scal:rsvp, scal:attendeeContact, scal:attendeeRole, scal:attendanceStatus,

refsect2.title: scal:JournalStatus
refsect2.para: Predefined instances of status for journals

refsect2.title: scal:CalendarUserType
refsect2.para: Predefined set of instance for calendar user types

refsect2.title: scal:Calendar
refsect2.para: Group calendar items

refsect2.title: scal:EventStatus
refsect2.para: Predefined instances of status for events

refsect2.title: scal:contact
refsect2.para: Contact related with the Calendar Item (spec 4.8.4.2)

refsect2.title: scal:attendeeContact
refsect2.para: Link from the attendee to the actual contact

refsect2.title: scal:isAllDay
refsect2.para: True if the event applies to the whole day

refsect2.title: scal:member
refsect2.para: To specify the group or list membership of the calendar user specified by the property

refsect2.title: scal:rrule
refsect2.para: Repeating pattern for recurring CalendarItems

refsect2.title: scal:start
refsect2.para: Start time of a calendar item

refsect2.title: scal:rsvp
refsect2.para: Link an attendee with his rsvp status

refsect2.title: scal:calendarUserType
refsect2.para: Link an attendee instance with a cutype

refsect2.title: scal:sent-by
refsect2.para: to indicate whom is acting on behalf of the ATTENDEE

refsect2.title: scal:resources
refsect2.para: Resources required for the calendar item (equipment, installations...)

refsect2.title: scal:textLocation
refsect2.para: Textual description of location for an item. Sec. 4.8.1.7. Use better mlo:location

refsect2.title: scal:priority
refsect2.para: Relative priority of th event

refsect2.title: scal:percentComplete
refsect2.para: % of the task completed

refsect2.title: scal:TimeZone
refsect2.para: Timezone in the OLSON DB used as reference in the time. Use 'floating' for floating times or study the convenience of a boolean 'isFloating' attribute.

refsect2.title: scal:alarmAttendee
refsect2.para: Alarms can have attendees. RFC has told

refsect2.title: scal:recurrenceStartDate
refsect2.para: Reuse here the start-date instance of the base event for this recurrence rule. This property makes possible to retrieve all required data to expand the recurrence rule in one short query

refsect2.title: scal:delegated-from
refsect2.para: to indicate the calendar users whom the request was delegated from

refsect2.title: scal:access
refsect2.para: Access classification: public private...

refsect2.title: scal:attendeeRole
refsect2.para: Property to link with an attendee role instance

refsect2.title: scal:transparency
refsect2.para: Time transparency for the item (busy time or transparent)

refsect2.title: scal:dateTime
refsect2.para: Date and time in UTC

refsect2.title: scal:rdate
refsect2.para: One of more concrete ocurrences of the calendar item using ';' as separator. Included for backward compatibility. Use rrule instead

refsect2.title: scal:completed
refsect2.para: Time when the task was completed

refsect2.title: scal:journalStatus
refsect2.para: Link of an journal with its status

refsect2.title: scal:belongsToCalendar
refsect2.para: Relation between a calendar item and a calendar.

refsect2.title: scal:exceptionRDate
refsect2.para: One of more concrete exceptions of the calendar item using ';' as separator. Included for backward compatibility. Use rrule with exception='true' instead

refsect2.title: scal:anniversary
refsect2.para: links a contact with the calendar event of an anniversary. (SCAL version)

refsect2.title: scal:attendanceStatus
refsect2.para: Status of contact's assitance to the event

refsect2.title: scal:alarmOffset
refsect2.para: Offset of the alarm respect to the Calendar item start time. In minutes

refsect2.title: scal:eventStatus
refsect2.para: Link of an event with its status

refsect2.title: scal:delegated-to
refsect2.para: to indicate the calendar users that the original request was delegated to

refsect2.title: scal:due
refsect2.para: Due time for a task to be completed

refsect2.title: scal:attendee
refsect2.para: Link of an Calendar item with an attendee, that can have different status

refsect2.title: scal:end
refsect2.para: End time of a calendar item. Set always a value to avoid OPTIONALS

refsect2.title: scal:recurrencePattern
refsect2.para: Recurrence pattern enforcing all (14) the fields in RFC2445/4.3.10, with ';' as separator: freq;until;count;interval;bysecond;byminute;byhour;byday;bymonthday;byyearday;byweekno;bymonth;bysetpos;wkst

refsect2.title: scal:exception
refsect2.para: True if this recurrence rules must be interpreted as an exception

refsect2.title: scal:calendarItemAlarm
refsect2.para: Link between calendar item and alarm

refsect2.title: scal:todoStatus
refsect2.para: Link of an todo with its status

refsect2.title: scal:attachment
refsect2.para: Item attached to a calendar item

refsect2.title: scal:birthday
refsect2.para: links a contact with the calendar event of his birthday. (SCAL version)
